     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox10473267">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10473267">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10473267">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Statistical Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10473267">
          <div id="boxatt10473267" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link18640047">
              <a id="link_18640047" href="http://bigcharts.marketwatch.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(18640047,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Accounting, Business, Economics, &amp; Finance', 'page_name' : 'Statistical Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18640047}); ">
               BigCharts
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A open-access resource. Comprehensive and easy-to-use investment research web site, providing access to professional-level research tools such as interactive charts, quotes, industry analysis and intraday stock screeners, as well as market news and commentary.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link14260480">
              <a id="link_14260480" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.bizminer.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(14260480,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Accounting, Business, Economics, &amp; Finance', 'page_name' : 'Statistical Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 14260480}); ">
               BizMiner
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               BizMiner produces the most granular industry statistical reports in the market. We offer industry financial analysis benchmarks for over 5,000 lines of business and industry market trends on thousands more. Our market analysis reports are available at the national and local levels down to the zip code. Focus on sales classes of &lt; $500m.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12730958">
              <a id="link_12730958" href="http://fedstats.sites.usa.gov/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12730958,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Accounting, Business, Economics, &amp; Finance', 'page_name' : 'Statistical Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12730958}); ">
               FedStats
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Gateway to statistics from U.S. Federal agencies.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25439279">
              <a id="link_25439279" href="http://www.icpsr.umich.edu/index.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25439279,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Accounting, Business, Economics, &amp; Finance', 'page_name' : 'Statistical Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12811465}); ">
               ICPSR (Inter-University Consortium for Political and Social Research)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A data archive of more than 500,000 files of research in the social sciences. Specialized collections of data in education, aging, criminal justice, substance abuse, terrorism, and other fields.  Full access available only to Muhlenberg faculty, students, and staff who create accounts using their Muhlenberg email addresses.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12730971">
              <a id="link_12730971" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.portal.euromonitor.com/portal/server.pt" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12730971,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Accounting, Business, Economics, &amp; Finance', 'page_name' : 'Statistical Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12730971}); ">
               Passport Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Passport Reference, published by Euromonitor, provides comparable international business intelligence on countries, consumers and industries. It offers access to more than 1 million country, market and lifestyle statistics; 4,500 market research reports (global reports, country reports, industry reports, company reports and lifestyle reports); 205 country profiles: company market share and brand share rankings; 35,000 business information sources.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25439294">
              <a id="link_25439294" href="http://www.rug.nl/research/ggdc/data/pwt/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25439294,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Accounting, Business, Economics, &amp; Finance', 'page_name' : 'Statistical Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25439294}); ">
               Penn World Tables
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The University of Groningen maintains the Penn World Table (PWT), a widely used data set for international comparisons containing consistent measures of economic aggregates and prices across nations and over time.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25439291">
              <a id="link_25439291" href="http://pasdc.hbg.psu.edu/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25439291,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Accounting, Business, Economics, &amp; Finance', 'page_name' : 'Statistical Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12811470}); ">
               Pennsylvania State Data Center
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Official source of demographic and economic data for Pennsylvania.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25171650">
              <a id="link_25171650" href="http://www.pewinternet.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25171650,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Accounting, Business, Economics, &amp; Finance', 'page_name' : 'Statistical Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25171650}); ">
               Pew Internet
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Pew Research Center is a nonpartisan fact tank that informs the public about the issues, attitudes and trends shaping America and the world. We conduct public opinion polling, demographic research, content analysis and other data-driven social science research. We do not take policy positions.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25439280">
              <a id="link_25439280" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.proquest.com/statistical" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25439280,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Accounting, Business, Economics, &amp; Finance', 'page_name' : 'Statistical Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12599240}); ">
               ProQuest Statistical Insight
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Statistical information produced by U.S. federal agencies, states, and intergovernmental organizations.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link17494421">
              <a id="link_17494421" href="https://oneview.simmonsresearch.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(17494421,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Accounting, Business, Economics, &amp; Finance', 'page_name' : 'Statistical Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 17494421}); ">
               Simmons National Consumer Survey (Oneview)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Consumer segmentation for the continental U.S., adults. Password required for use. Contact kcannon@muhlenberg.edu.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25439282">
              <a id="link_25439282" href="http://www.census.gov/compendia/statab/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25439282,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Accounting, Business, Economics, &amp; Finance', 'page_name' : 'Statistical Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12811469}); ">
               Statistical Abstract of the United States
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The authoritative and comprehensive summary of statistics on the social, political, and economic organization of the United States.  This site includes archived editions (1995-2012).   Old print editions (1886- ) are in the Trexler Library Government Documents section starting at C 3.134:886.  See the ProQuest Statistical Insight database for the 2013 Statistical Abstract.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12730980">
              <a id="link_12730980" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www3.valueline.com/is/5000index.aspx" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12730980,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Accounting, Business, Economics, &amp; Finance', 'page_name' : 'Statistical Sources'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12730980}); ">
               ValueLine
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Provides information on U.S. companies that sell stock. Information includes graphs, charts, ratings, and peer group analysis.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile2978972" class="profile_wrapper">
       <div class="roundbox outerbox">

             <div class="profile_display_name">
              Kelly Cannon
